Twelve years ago, # Solidarity Economy, self-management, solidarity finance, community banks were only vague ideas.
Ideas that have been debated and about which a lot of hope has been thrown. It is for ideas that we move. #Solidarity economy
We have a development model that recognizes and values ​​#Solidaria Economics as a legitimate and necessary form of work organization.
Institutionalized # Solidarity Economy, we created the Secretariat of Solidarity Economy and we have to recognize the leadership of Paul Singer.
We create opportunities for thousands of Brazilians who believe in cooperation and self-management as a solution to economic and social problems.
We have made progress in the modernization of legislation to support cooperatives and we have established the National Program for the Promotion of Cooperatives.
With the regulation of cooperatives, we have opened opportunities in the world of work for traditionally excluded segments. #Solidarity economy
Our commitment is to create opportunities in a very simple way: opening doors. #Solidarity economy
All of you, delegates and delegates, were partners and protagonists in the construction of these policies. #Solidarity economy
In the next 4 years, I will establish constructive and ongoing dialogue with you. #Solidarity economy
We will further strengthen solidarity projects throughout the country. #Solidary economy
I received a new mandate from the Brazilian people to continue making changes. #Solidarity economy
I will continue to prioritize social inclusion, employment, access to education, guarantee of rights (...)
(...) political and economic stability, investment in infrastructure and modernization of the country and raising the income of the people.
The promotion of #Solidaria Economy will undoubtedly be among our priorities.
I look forward to your contributions, we will continue to build together a priority path that also focuses on #Solidary Economics.
